conclusion: Preliminary objection rejected (non-exhaustion);Preliminary objection rejected (six month period);Violation of Art. 8;Not necessary to examine Art. 3;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Costs and expenses award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
